```{r}
source("Main.R")
```

```{r}
kamala_harris_data<-democratic_party_primary_polling|>filter(Candidate=="Kamala Harris")|>mutate(Poll_Boundary=ifelse(State=="NULL","Nationwide",State))
print(kamala_harris_data)
```

```{r fig.width=10}
kamala_harris_chart<-kamala_harris_data|>ggplot(aes(x=DMY,y=Polling,color=Poll_Boundary)) + geom_point(alpha=0.6) + theme_gray(base_size=14)+geom_line() +scale_x_date(date_breaks="3 months") + labs(title="Kamala Harris",x="Date",Y="Polling (%)")
kamala_harris_chart 
```

```{r}
kamala_harris_summary<-kamala_harris_data|>summarise(avg_polling=round(mean(Polling),digits=2),weighted_avg_polling=round(sum(Polling * Sample_Size/(sum(Sample_Size,na.rm=TRUE)),na.rm=TRUE),digits=2),
                                                     standard_deviation=round(sd(Polling),digits=2),maximum_polling=max(Polling),minimum_polling=min(Polling),median_polling=median(Polling))
print(kamala_harris_summary)
```
